sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-panel title="Wallet">
    <template #form-wrap>
      <Form
        v-for="wallet in wallets"
        :key="wallet.currency"
        :title="wallet.currency.capitalize() + ' address'"
        type="text"
        :value="wallet.address"
        :full="true"
        :balance="wallet.balance"
        :secret="true"
      />
      <Button
        class="form__button"
        text="Get balance"
        theme="secondary_big"
      />
    </template>
  </v-panel>
</template>

<script>
import Button from '../Button.vue';
import Form from '../Form.vue';
import { mapGetters } from 'vuex';

export default {
  name: 'Wallet',
  components: {
    Button,
    Form,
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters({
      wallets: 'auth/profileWallets'
    })
  },
};
</script>

<style lang="sass" scoped>
@import "../../../../scss/smart-grid"
@import "../../../../scss/variables"

.form__button
  width: 150px
  margin-right: calc(100% - 150px)
</style>
